description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Our Country. A household history, ... from the discovery of America to the one hundredth anniversary of the Declaration of Independence ... With ... illustrations, etc" Author: LOSSING, Benson John. Contributor: DARLEY, Felix Octavius Carr. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.g.8." Volume: 02 Page: 333 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1875 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002263917 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
